HSK 5: 損,损
Freq: 9438
簨，读sǔn xun zhuàn，是汉语词汇，解释为古代悬挂钟、磬、鼓的架子上的横梁。
簨, pronounced sǔn xun zhuàn, is a Chinese vocabulary and is interpreted as a beam on a shelf where bells, chimes, and drums are hung in ancient times.

簨字的基本解释

簨
sǔn
古代悬挂钟、磬、鼓的架子上的横梁。

簨
zhuàn
竹器。

簨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǔn］
［《廣韻》思尹切，上準，心。］
(1)古代悬挂钟磬架子的横杆。
(2)指某些农具的横梁。
[②]［zhuàn］
［《集韻》雛綰切，上潸，崇。］
竹器。

簨字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　簨； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页900第24
【廣韻】思尹切【集韻】【韻會】聳尹切【正韻】聳允切，?音筍。【廣韻】簨虡。【釋名】所以懸鼓者。橫曰簨。簨，峻也，在上高峻也。縱曰虡。虡，舉也，在旁舉簨也。簨上之版曰業，刻爲牙，捷業如鋸齒也。【禮·明堂位】夏后氏之龍簨虡。【註】簨、虡，所以懸鐘磬。橫曰簨，飾之以鱗屬。植曰虡，飾之以臝屬、羽屬。　又【集韻】雛綰切，音撰。竹器。【禮·喪大記】食于簨。徐邈讀。　又【正韻】《考工記》作筍。亦作栒、?。

簨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
簨字的起名意思

暂无。

crossbeam for hanging bells
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sǔn]
["Guangyun" Si Yinqie, quasi, heart. ]
(1) The rails used to hang bells and chimes in ancient times.
(2) Refers to the beams of certain farm tools.
[②]［zhuàn］
["Ji Yun" Chuanqie, Shanglu, Chong. ]
Bamboo ware.

[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　簨; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 900 24
[Guang Yun] Si Yin Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Shrug Yin Cut [Zheng Yun] Shrug and allow cut,? Sound shoots. [Guangyun] 簨虡. [Release name] So those who hang drums. Heng said 簨. Yan, stern, high and stern. Zong said Ya.虡, give it up, give it aside. The version on the 簨 is called karma, carved as teeth, and karma is like a sawtooth. 【Rite·Mingtang】The dragon 谨虡 of the Xiahou clan. [Note] Yan and Xiao, so the bell is hanging. Heng said 簨, decorated with scales. The plant is called Ya, and it is decorated with nude genera and plumeria.　[Jiyun] Hina Wan cut, phonetic writing. Bamboo ware. 【Ritual·Mourning Records】Eat in 簨. Xu Miao reads.　[Zhengyun] "Kaogongji" made bamboo shoots. Also used as 栒、?.
